#summary YUI3 Notes

= mistakes =

== new object instance ==
{{{
// Chrome:
Uncaught TypeError: Cannot call method 'apply' of undefined

// FireFox:
this.init is undefined
}}}

以上問題可能是因為在產生物件時，少打了 `new`

{{{
// 錯
var router = Y.RouterAPI();

// 正確
var router = new Y.RouterAPI();
}}}

= tips =

== Async get script ==

{{{
Y.Get.script(url, {
  attributes : {
    async: "true"
  }
});
}}}

= 地雷 =

 * Y.each 在 YUI 3.0.0 的版本不會忽略 null
